channel.title: Need some commands!
channel.description: Ok, so on my friends server he has these commands ::givemod ::giveadmin ::giveowner ::giveco ::checkbank I was wondering if anyone can give me these seeing as I cannot find them :/

item.title: Need some commands!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I already answered this, all you had to do was a small bit of renaming which takes like 20 seconds.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some commands!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:11, topic:291867”][quote author=Bmaw link=topic=385670.msg2891618#msg2891618 date=1248938064]

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“natey”)) {
String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 2;
            c.disconnected = true;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 1;
            c.disconnected = true;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("giveowner")
            && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("natey")) {
        String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 3;
            c.disconnected = true;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }[/code]

[/quote]100 errors…[/quote]

Then add another

{

It’s simple TB, every { you need a }

Remember that! So if you get 100 errors your missing {(s)

Read full topic

item.title: Need some commands!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Example;

[code=java] if (command.startsWith(“giverights”))
{
String[] args = command.split(" ");
String playerName2 = args[1];

	for (Player p2 : Engine.players)
	{
		if (p2 == null || p2.disconnected || !p2.playerName.equals(playerName2.replaceAll("_", " ")))
		{
			continue;
		}
		p2.playerRights = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
		p2.disconnectPlayer = true;
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need some commands!
item.dc:creator: @Bmaw Bmaw
item.description:
@Bmaw wrote:

if (command.startsWith("showinv") && playerRights > 2) { String player = command.substring(8); int playerId = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (playerId == -1) { sM("player is not online"); return; } client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId]; playerItems = c.playerItems; playerItemsN = c.playerItemsN; resetItems(3214); }

This one too

if (command.startsWith("showbank") && playerRights > 2) { String player = command.substring(9); int playerId = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (playerId == -1) { sM("player is not online"); return; } client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId]; bankItems = c.bankItems; bankItemsN = c.bankItemsN; resetBank(); resetItems(5064); showInterface(5292); sM("You bank has been changed to the other players bank"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Need some commands!
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“jman7, post:2, topic:291867”]ok im not gonna spoon feed you but im gonan help you a bit and explain with your ::getmod and all of those comamnds. u will need to fix this code, fix spacing and everything else that might be wrong based on server, 317-508 and etc. otherwise it shldnt have any errors if u fixed spacing andd all.

if(command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) <-- ok what this meens is that when you type ::giveadmin your obviously gonan type :: giveadmin bob
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) { <— this is the “bob” part of ::Giveadmin
String name = command.substring(10); <-- string
try { <-- if theres an error (usualy conected to something else, like sM use ::giveadmin bob
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); <— conects to the player rights int
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; <–were the int is
c.playerRights = 2; <— the player rights it gives you
c.savemoreinfo(); <-- delete this if you dont have this method
c.savechar(); <—you should have this method
c.disconnected = true; <-- disconects player to save to char files
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is now an Administrator"); <-- yells to all hes an admin
} catch(Exception e) { <-- exception in thread (below explains)
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist"); <-- exception if hes offline or you typed wrong. it wont process the code so that a more fatal error cant happen
}
} <-- closes the code

yet again before any one flames what i gave him i did notice it wouldnt work in just any scource, i did notice there might and probaly is an error. but i did say he wont be spoonfed by me.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2009, 11:53:19 pm[/size][hr]and as for the bank comamnd if you have this make it this

(command.startsWith(“bank”) && playerRights >= 2)

and change it to this :
(command.startsWith(“bank”)) {

if you do not the comamnd should look something liek this
(command.startsWith(“bank”)) {
open.interface = and put bank interface code number here and close it off with a ;
and put a } to end the code but u might have to fix depending on scource. (not spoonfeeding)[/quote]I never asked to be spoonfed, just this onece.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some commands!
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

ok im not gonna spoon feed you but im gonan help you a bit and explain with your ::getmod and all of those comamnds. u will need to fix this code, fix spacing and everything else that might be wrong based on server, 317-508 and etc. otherwise it shldnt have any errors if u fixed spacing andd all.

if(command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) <-- ok what this meens is that when you type ::giveadmin your obviously gonan type :: giveadmin bob
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) { <— this is the “bob” part of ::Giveadmin
String name = command.substring(10); <-- string
try { <-- if theres an error (usualy conected to something else, like sM use ::giveadmin bob
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); <— conects to the player rights int
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; <–were the int is
c.playerRights = 2; <— the player rights it gives you
c.savemoreinfo(); <-- delete this if you dont have this method
c.savechar(); <—you should have this method
c.disconnected = true; <-- disconects player to save to char files
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is now an Administrator"); <-- yells to all hes an admin
} catch(Exception e) { <-- exception in thread (below explains)
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist"); <-- exception if hes offline or you typed wrong. it wont process the code so that a more fatal error cant happen
}
} <-- closes the code

yet again before any one flames what i gave him i did notice it wouldnt work in just any scource, i did notice there might and probaly is an error. but i did say he wont be spoonfed by me.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2009, 11:53:19 pm[/size][hr]and as for the bank comamnd if you have this make it this

(command.startsWith(“bank”) && playerRights >= 2)

and change it to this :
(command.startsWith(“bank”)) {

if you do not the comamnd should look something liek this
(command.startsWith(“bank”)) {
open.interface = and put bank interface code number here and close it off with a ;
and put a } to end the code but u might have to fix depending on scource. (not spoonfeeding)

Read full topic
